name: mvc-rest-api-rakib
description: - REST API routes planning  - installing and importing packages     - Install : npm init -y          - npm install express           - npm install nodemon          - npm install dotenv         - npm install cors         - npm install body-parser         - npm install uuid  - creating the express server  - creating a home route,  - handling invalid route  - handling server error  - creating MVC architectures     - model     - controller     - routers     - views  - GET Method   - POST Method  - PUT Method  - DELETE Method  - deploy REST  API  - pushing on GitHub
